effect.name: Alpha Gradient (SUPERCEDED)
effect.description:
Fill the alpha channel with a specified gradient.
This effect has been replaced by frei0r.alphaops_alphagrad.
effect.author: Marko Cebokli

parameter.name: Transition width
Transition Width
parameter.comment: Define the width of the transition between the densities.

parameter.name: Min
Transparency Top
parameter.comment: Define the transparency at the top of the gradient.

parameter.name: Max
Transparency Bottom
parameter.comment: Define the transparency at the bottom of the gradient.

parameter.name: Operation
Operation
parameter.comment: Define the alpha operation for compositing.
